text: A tetracontagon or 40-gon is a shape with 40 sides and 40 corners. == Regular tetracontagon == All sides of a regular tetracontagon are the same length. Each corner is 171°. All corners added together equal 6840°. === Area === The amount of space a regular tetracontagon takes up is :\text{Area} = 10\left(1+\sqrt{5}+\sqrt{5+2\sqrt{5}}+\sqrt{\left(1+\sqrt{5}+\sqrt{5+2\sqrt{5}}\right)^2+1}\right)t^2 a is the length of one of its sides. 40
title: Tetracontagon
